# Kaczmarski's Inspiration in Mirrors

I'll reveal a little curiosity about this book today...

## Songs About Paintings

If someone knows Kaczmarski's work (yes I know, various things have come to light recently and I don't like it either), they probably remember that he wrote many songs about paintings and books. He simply told in a song the story that was told, for example, in a painting.

Take "Exile of Students" based on Malczewski's painting, "Encore, Once More" based on Fiedotov's painting, songs about characters from Sienkiewicz's Trilogy and many others. It always fascinated me, especially since Kaczmarski painted these stories with words and music in a very sensory way.

## My Attempt

So... well... I tried something similar in Mirrors, in a sense... 

How it turned out... well, you tell me
